terms.definition: Edinburgh Postnatal Depression Scale - I have been able to laugh and see the funny side of things.
terms.preferredTerm: EPDS - Able to Laugh and See Funny Side
terms.submissionValue: EPDS01-Able to Laugh and See Funny Side
synonyms: EPDS01-Able to Laugh and See Funny Side

terms.definition: Edinburgh Postnatal Depression Scale - I have been anxious or worried for no good reason.
terms.preferredTerm: EPDS - Anxious or Worried No Good Reason

terms.definition: Edinburgh Postnatal Depression Scale - I have blamed myself unnecessarily when things went wrong.
Edinburgh Postnatal Depression Scale - I have felt sad or miserable.
terms.preferredTerm: EPDS - I Have Felt Sad or Miserable
terms.submissionValue: EPDS01-I Have Felt Sad or Miserable
synonyms: EPDS01-I Have Felt Sad or Miserable

terms.definition: Edinburgh Postnatal Depression Scale - I have looked forward with enjoyment to things.
Edinburgh Postnatal Depression Scale - I have felt scared or panicky for no very good reason.
terms.preferredTerm: EPDS - Scared or Panicky for No Good Reason

terms.definition: Edinburgh Postnatal Depression Scale - I have been so unhappy that I have been crying.
terms.preferredTerm: EPDS - So Unhappy I Have Been Crying
terms.submissionValue: EPDS01-So Unhappy I Have Been Crying

terms.definition: Edinburgh Postnatal Depression Scale - Things have been getting on top of me.

terms.definition: Edinburgh Postnatal Depression Scale - The thought of harming myself has occurred to me.
Edinburgh Postnatal Depression Scale - I have been so unhappy that I have had difficulty sleeping.
